law.text: All reuse water valves, storage facilities and outlets shall be tagged or labeled to warn the public or employees that the water is not intended for drinking. All reuse water piping, valves, outlets and other appurtenances shall be color-coded, taped, or otherwise marked to identify the source of the water as being reuse water, as defined in the Public Utility Handbook. (Ord. No. 2006-100, ยง1, 9-19-06)
